splits.title: Bro Split (Overview)
splits.text: Bro split: 5 training days per week. Typical layout: Chest, Back, Shoulders, Legs, Arms. Focus each session on one major muscle group with accessory movements and moderate-to-high volume.

splits.title: Bro Split - Day 1: Chest
splits.text: Chest day: flat barbell bench press 4x6-8, incline dumbbell press 3x8-12, decline bench 3x8-12, cable fly 3x12-15, pushups 2xAMRAP. Emphasize progressive overload and chest-mind connection.

splits.title: Bro Split - Day 2: Back
splits.text: Back day: deadlift 3x3-5 or rack pulls 3x4-6, bent-over rows 4x6-10, lat pulldowns 3x8-12, seated cable rows 3x8-12, face pulls 3x15. Include vertical and horizontal pulling.

splits.title: Bro Split - Day 3: Shoulders
splits.text: Shoulder day: overhead press 4x5-8, lateral raises 4x12-15, front raises 3x10-12, rear delt fly 3x12-15, shrugs 3x8-12.

splits.title: Bro Split - Day 4: Legs
splits.text: Leg day: squat 4x5-8, Romanian deadlift 3x6-10, leg press 3x10-15, lunges 3x8-12 per leg, hamstring curls 3x10-15, calf raises 4x12-20.

splits.title: Bro Split - Day 5: Arms
splits.text: Arms day: close-grip bench press 3x6-8, barbell curls 3x6-10, skull crushers 3x8-12, incline dumbbell curls 3x8-12, cable pushdowns 3x12-15. High volume for biceps and triceps.

splits.title: Push/Pull/Legs Split (Overview)
splits.text: Push/Pull/Legs (PPL): 3-day rotation often done 6 days/week (P,P,L,P,P,L) or 3 days/week. Push focuses on chest/shoulders/triceps; Pull on back/biceps; Legs on quads/hamstrings/glutes.

splits.title: PPL - Push Day
splits.text: Push day: bench press 4x5-8, overhead press 4x6-8, incline dumbbell press 3x8-12, lateral raises 4x12-15, triceps dips 3x8-12, cable pushdowns 3x12-15.

splits.title: PPL - Pull Day
splits.text: Pull day: deadlift or heavy row 3x3-6, pull-ups 4xAMRAP or lat pulldowns 4x8-12, seated cable rows 3x8-12, hammer curls 3x10-12, face pulls 3x15.

splits.title: PPL - Legs Day
splits.text: Legs day: squat 4x5-8, leg press 3x10-15, Romanian deadlift 3x6-10, walking lunges 3x10 per leg, leg curls 3x10-15, standing calf raises 4x12-20.

splits.title: General Notes - Recovery & Progression
splits.text: Prioritize sleep, nutrition, and progressive overload. Adjust volume and frequency based on recovery. Deload every 4-8 weeks as needed. Use RPE 7-9 for most working sets.
